dialogues.text: She raises her glass.  Everyone at the table does the sam

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is to my best friend.  On the occasion of his wedding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shouts of support, a few whistles.  Silence.  She tells M

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I have truly come to know your bride as my new sister. This is in her heart...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She has to stop.  Swallows.  Because she will not let her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Understand.  I'll slip quietly away from the noisy crowd when I see the pale stars rising, blooming, over the oaks."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deep breath.  Looks in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "I'll pursue solitary pathways through the pale twilit meadows, with only this one dream: You come too."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hush.  SHARP applause.  From four hundred hands.  But n his.  He is too moved.  Too understanding of what he has

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have a wedding gift. But this is on loan.  Until you two find your song...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And with that the band begins.  The opening phrases of a have come to know.  Michael seems overwhelmed.  Julianne toward the gazebo... ... Michael takes his bride's hand, leads her up the stai his arms, as the twins step to the microphone, and guests applaud an unscheduled wedding dance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing) Someday, when I'm awfully low, And the world is cold, I will feel a glow just thinking of you, And the way you look tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soft two-part harmony.  As perfect as the words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing) You're lovely.  With your smile so warm, And your cheeks so soft, There is nothing for me but to love you, Just the way you look tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julianne can cry now.  Because she's tied with half the p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing) With each word, your tenderness grows, Tearing my fears apart... And the laugh that wrinkles your nose, Touches my foolish heart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Julianne begins to sing.  Unheard.  Unseen.  Even by the singing to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (singing) You're lovely, please don't ever change, Keep that breathless charm, Darling, please arrange it, cos I love you... Just the way you look tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The band keeps playing.  The dance goes on.  Two people l other.  The way it's supposed to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bedlam.  Julianne caught in the middle of the throng.  A couple, dressed for travel, appear at the top of the stai The SHOUT are deafening.  The bride has her bouquet... ... she spots Julianne far below.  THROWS it her way, Jul reflexively GOES FOR IT... ... not a fucking chance.  The twins nearly TRAMPLE her i stampede, Mandy WRESTING the prize from Sammy's grasp.  E CHEERS, and then the couple is... ... FLYING down the stairs, RACING through the crowd with protective phalanx of groomsmen bodyguards, heading for t for freedom... ... Julianne, trapped in the crush, loses sight of the co struggles against the flow, suddenly panicked by the cert that she will never see him before... And then, he's THERE.  He has Julianne in his arms.  Hold so tight.  An embrace so wonderful, so terrible, she coul from the confusion alone.  Against the din, he murmurs in ear...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wherever I go.  However far...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sobs.  Holds him. Deep, deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You win a few, you lose a few. Some get rained out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And to her surprise...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (V.O., very softly) You have a good time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To her greater surprise.  There are a few tears left, aft

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did what I came to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (V.O., even softer) Good girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She just can't speak now.  So she doesn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was thinking.  Maybe you might visit us for awhile.  We've got the room made up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This fucking guy.  God, she loves him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll think about it.  I'm okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you're more than okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just above a whisper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And with the last of her strength...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If the sun comes up, I'll see you tomorrow, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A chuckle.  At the other end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll play those odds.  You have sweet dreams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear the CLICK.  She turns her back on the stars.  Sho straight.  Chin up. She walks from frame. FADE TO BLACK.  HOLD END CREDITS.
